docs.lead_paragraph: The hope was that Paris and the rest of France would limp back to normal this week after a paralyzing national rail strike and a struggle between public-sector labor unions and the Government over austerity measures to reduce the federal deficit. But after three weeks in which many hundreds of thousands marched to support the strikers, it seems clear that it will take a long time to heal the wounds.
